item.title: Adduser Command
item.description: Adduser Options Adduser Examples Add a New User Add a User With Default Directory Add a User With a Primary Group Add a User With a Supplementary Group Add a User Without Home Directory Create a System Account Add User With a Default Login Shell Adduser Options -d: Directory Path -g: Primary Group Name -G: Supplementary Group Name -M: No Home Directory -r: System User -s: Shell Path Adduser Examples Add a New User sudo adduser username Add a User With Default Directory sudo adduser -d /directory/path username Add a User With a Primary Group sudo adduser -g groupname username Add a User With a Supplementary Group sudo adduser -G admin username Add a User Without Home Directory sudo adduser -M username Create a System Account sudo adduser -r mike Add User With a Default Login Shell sudo adduser -s /bin/bash mike

item.title: Useradd Command
item.description: Useradd Options Useradd Examples Creating a User With Specific Home Directory Creating a User With Specific User And Group ID Creating a User And Assign Multiple Groups Creating a User with Specific Login Shell Creating a System User Useradd Options -m: Create Home -d: Directory Path -u: User ID -g: Group ID -G: Secondary Groups Comma Separated -s: Login Shell Path -r: System User Useradd Examples Creating a User With Specific Home Directory sudo useradd -m -d /opt/username username Creating a User With Specific User And Group ID sudo useradd -u 1500 username Creating a User And Assign Multiple Groups sudo useradd -g users -G wheel,developers username Creating a User with Specific Login Shell sudo useradd -s /usr/bin/zsh username Creating a System User sudo useradd -r username

item.title: Usermod Command
item.description: Usermod Options Usermod Examples Change User Home Directory Change User Primary Group Adding Group to an Existing User Change User Login Name Move User Home Directory to New location Change User Shell Change User and Group ID For User Usermod Options -d: Directory Path -g: Primary Group -G: Adding Supplementary Group to Existing User -l: New Login -d: Directory Path -m: Home Directory -s: Shell Path Usermod Examples Change User Home Directory sudo usermod -d /var/www/ username Change User Primary Group sudo usermod -g groupname username Adding Group to an Existing User sudo usermod -G supgroup username Change User Login Name sudo usermod -l new_username username Move User Home Directory to New location sudo usermod -d /directory/path -m username Change User Shell sudo usermod -s /bin/sh username Change User and Group ID For User sudo usermod -u 888 -g 999 username
